titleStmt.title: A vindication of the army under the command of Sir Thomas Fairfax, with an answer to several objections made against them, &c.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected and enlarged.

notesStmt.note: The pamphlet "Heads presented by the army to the Kings Majesty" is false scandalous, and injurious to us, and has never been sent by the King -- Cf. Steele I, 2711.

The second edition of: A vindication of the army under the command of his Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax, concerning a pamphlet lately printed and published, intituled, Heads presented by the army to the Kings Majesty.

At foot of page: It is desired that this be set up in parish churches, and publick places, throughout this kingdom and dominion of Wales, for their information, &c. The second edition, corrected and enlarged. 1647.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
